description: yeehaa is a dedicated professional with extensive experience in digital innovation and technology strategy. He leads tech initiatives across Europe, excelling in software development, data analytics, and project management. His work includes authoring blogs like 'Across Space And Time' on ecosystem architecture and curating courses such as 'Groom Your Ecosystem,' focusing on leadership, adaptability, creativity, and aesthetics.
blurb: Ecosystems, once tied to biology, are now metaphorically overused in fields like crypto, indicating a desire for less hierarchical organizations. Modern ecosystems transcend space and time, needing careful, open-ended design.
